attributes.action: Government to view gypsies with benefits and then tell us that immigrants can t get benefits after a few days
attributes.additional_details: Government to stop misinforming the public stating that immigrants cannot get benefits for a certain length of time. If they watch on channel five Gypsies on benefits and proud of it. Maybe they would see how people get so angry about this subject. They are laughing at you and therefore us. Tell the truth to the public. Also they should not be getting anything from here including for their children at home or benefits for disability when they have been allowed into this Country disabled and then claim dla.
